title: I Will Destroy You (Part 1)
body:
I Will Destroy You (Part 1)

Leon stood with his fist tightly clenched.

He looked at Amy, Gloria, and Jackson, all three of them were recruited by Issac in the silver star guild.

He doesn't know why but Issac didn't make any offer to him.

Other guilds also made the offer for the students they were interested in.

Most of the students received invitations from bronze and silver level guilds.

Some students accepted the offer while some said they need more time before they can make a decision.

Even though Leon didn't receive an invitation from the silver star guild, he received invitations from all three gold rank guilds.

But since Leon was told to join the silver star guild, just like some students he said he need some time to decide.

'Damm it, I failed in this mission as well' Leon said while sweating inwardly.

Till now he wasn't able to complete any mission given to him by the dark guild.
